alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 1:31PM PST until February 27 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WEEKEND SNOW... .Snow will return to the mountains tonight with the arrival of the first of a series of systems to the region. Snow intensity will increase late tonight before waning early Sunday afternoon. A stronger system with heavier snow amounts will arrive late Sunday into Monday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Additional heavier snow will arrive late Sunday into Monday. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult across Stevens Pass on Highway 2.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
